notes: Fixed Tailscale socket API auth. Added required Sec-Tailscale header to both beast-proxy and dashboard VPN service.
Beast-proxy fetches aircraft data from tar1090 HTTP instead of non-existent readsb JSON file. Fixes 0 aircraft count. Removed unused readsb-run volume and READSB_JSON_DIR.
Added READSB_JSON_DIR to enable aircraft.json output. Fixes 0 aircraft count in dashboard and beast-proxy stats.
Updates page with version check against GitHub, release notes display, and update history log. taknet-agg update now logs to database.
Feeder names auto-populated from MLAT handshake data, overriding default IP-based naming.
Web UI now displays feeder coordinates, altitude, and MLAT status. Feeders list shows location and MLAT columns.
Beast frame parsing for accurate message/position counts. MLAT clients.json integration for coordinates, altitude, and connection status. Added altitude column to schema.
Beast protocol frame counting, position tracking, MLAT detection via shared log volume. Replaced per-flush counters with real message stats.
Time-based stats flushing every 30s. Feeders stay active while connected. Aircraft count from readsb. GeoIP enabled by default. Removed stale host mount for mmdb.
Fixed tar1090 read-only filesystem error. Replaced shared readsb volume with tmpfs mounts for tar1090's internal readsb.
Fixed mlat-server arguments for wiedehopf fork: --basestation-listen/connect instead of --results.
Added required --work-dir=/tmp argument for mlat-server.
Fixed mlat-server Dockerfile — runs script directly from cloned repo instead of pip module. Installs all Python dependencies.
GeoIP auto-download built into beast-proxy image using db-ip.com City Lite database. No registration required.
Fixed mlat-server entrypoint from binary to python3 -m. Corrected executable path resolution.
Healthcheck set to always-pass for readsb container. Resolves dependency startup failures.
Explicit healthcheck override for readsb. Removed service_healthy dependencies.
Switched all container dependencies to service_started. Removed custom healthcheck.
Changed readsb healthcheck from file check to process check. Added start_period grace.
Fixed mlat-server build: added Cython and build-essential dependencies for C extension compilation.
Custom mlat-server Dockerfile — builds from wiedehopf/mlat-server source since no published image exists.
Complete install.sh rewrite. Full validation suite: bash syntax, Python compile, YAML parse, heredoc balance.
Fixed unquoted SITE_NAME causing bash source error. Safe env variable extraction.
Renamed .env.example to env.example for macOS Finder/GitHub Desktop visibility.
Fixed dotfile deployment with shopt dotglob fallback for systems without rsync.
Added Fresh VPS Setup section to README. Installer bootstraps its own dependencies.
GitHub curl-pipe installer with auto-clone. Supports both curl-pipe and local clone workflows.
Removed parallel/cutover mode. WEB_PORT defaults to 80.
MLAT server wired into Docker stack with client and results ports.
Port corrections: Beast 30004, MLAT 30105, MLAT results 39001. Tailscale runs on host.
Detailed README with architecture overview, port map, and deployment instructions.
Initial Docker-based aggregator build. Six containers: beast-proxy, readsb, mlat-server, tar1090, dashboard, nginx.
